item.title: NEXTERA ENERGY INC 10-K
item.description: NEXTERA ENERGY INC, which is in the Electric Services [4911] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 17, 2023 had 53161 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fpl - 687 instances nee - 629 instances energy - 504 instances 2022 - 486 instances million - 444 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
